title: Riot Ban My Account
body: 2night, someone said bad words to me, and when we started to group and fight, my peer didnt help, I was playing adc. and at the end, rioit said u cant play for 14 days! I fk u rioit, When I was playing Rank, U sent me the teammate so rubbish! Let me lost the game, everytime when I report, you just ignore it! On what basis u think u can ban my account? Fk this game! FK U RIOIT!
